title: From Sun to Storage: How batteries are powering the shift to renewable energy
description: Advancements in PV technology have made solar panels more efficient and affordable, boosting India's transition to renewable energy. Solar batteries, particularly lithium-iron phosphate batteries, offer financial savings, reliability during power outages, and significant reductions in carbon emissions, aligning with India's climate goals for 2030.
